chunks.zh: 脸部经常出油, 怎么办才好, 时不时就涨痘
chunks.en: My face is often oily, what should I do, and I occasionally get acne

chunks.zh: 每天晚上用洗面奶洗脸, 早上洗脸脸部挺油的, 然后上班看电脑, 一整天脸都是油油的。
chunks.en: I wash my face with facial cleanser every night, and my face is quite oily in the morning. Then I look at the computer at work, and my face is oily all day long.

chunks.zh: 去医院挂皮肤科, 少面向网络治病, 每个人皮肤不一样的
chunks.en: Go to the dermatology department of a hospital, rely less on the internet for treatment, everyone's skin is different

chunks.zh: 一般来说就是：用适合自己肤质的护肤品做好保湿，比较热的时候有点油可以用吸油纸擦一擦，平时饮食尽量清淡，睡眠尽量规律且保持充足的睡眠时长，床上用品（尤其是面部接触较多的枕套）定期更换+日常让太阳晒一晒。在做好了这些的情况下，正常是不会还这样的，还这样说明是身体问题导致的，要去医院治疗。
chunks.en: Generally speaking: use skincare products suitable for your skin type to moisturize well, you can use oil-absorbing paper to wipe a little oil when it's hot, eat a light diet, sleep regularly and maintain sufficient sleep time, regularly change bedding (especially pillowcases that come into more contact with the face) + let the sun shine on it daily. If you've done all of these, it normally wouldn't be like this. If it still is, it means it's caused by a physical problem, and you should go to the hospital for treatment.

chunks.zh: 洗脸太多太频繁太干净的话，反而会促使皮肤分泌更多油脂来保护皮肤，因此这些年我都给改成：晚上睡觉前正常洗脸（但不能刚洗完脸抹完保湿什么的就躺下睡觉，中间要间隔一段时间，要让皮肤有一些时间来分泌少量油脂（介于皮肤和保湿乳之间），这点对保护皮肤还是很重要的），而早上起来如果没啥问题或重要事情，我就只用清水洗脸（这样其实也能洗掉一些最外层沾灰的油脂），感觉这几年下来脸上油脂已经没有当初那么严重了。
chunks.en: If you wash your face too much, too often, and too clean, it will instead encourage the skin to secrete more oil to protect the skin. Therefore, in recent years, I've changed to: washing my face normally before going to bed (but you can't just lie down to sleep after washing your face and applying moisturizer, there should be an interval, to allow the skin some time to secrete a small amount of oil (between the skin and the moisturizing lotion), this is very important for protecting the skin), and if there are no problems or important things in the morning, I only wash my face with water (this can actually wash away some of the outermost layer of oily dust). I feel that the oil on my face is not as serious as it used to be in the past few years.

chunks.zh: 早上脸油很正常啊，而且是好事啦，分泌的油脂有很多滋养成分。所以没必要烦恼，也不要过度清洁。预防痘可以早上涂一些壬二酸 10 ～ 20%的润肤霜，某宝某 p 一大堆，我买的最便宜的。
chunks.en: It's normal to be oily in the morning, and it's a good thing, the secreted oil has many nourishing ingredients. So there's no need to worry and don't over-cleanse. To prevent acne, you can apply some azelaic acid 10-20% moisturizer in the morning. There are a lot of them on Taobao and other platforms, I bought the cheapest one.

chunks.zh: 汗水是最好的护肤品
chunks.en: Sweat is the best skincare product

chunks.zh: 饮食清淡，买瓶维生素 B6 吃一个月看看效果。
chunks.en: Eat a light diet, buy a bottle of vitamin B6 and take it for a month to see the effect.

chunks.zh: 说实话痘不多也可以  异维 A 酸 无敌的 一天 2 颗  一点油都不出 但是对身体有副作用 现在降 1 天一颗 配合早晚洗面奶 还行 还没再发一颗
chunks.en: To be honest, if you don't have much acne, isotretinoin is invincible, 2 pills a day, no oil at all, but it has side effects on the body. Now reducing it to 1 pill a day, combined with facial cleanser in the morning and evening, it's okay, and I haven't had another breakout yet.

chunks.zh: 散粉，用了之后不可能还油
chunks.en: Setting powder, it's impossible to be oily after using it

chunks.zh: 杰士派男士湿巾  山姆买的淘宝也有 我必推
chunks.en: Gatsby Men's Wipes, bought from Sam's Club, also available on Taobao, I highly recommend them

chunks.zh: @javalaw2010 #1 好的， 一会买个试试
chunks.en: @javalaw2010 #1 Okay, I will buy one to try later

chunks.zh: @8355 #5 一般湿巾有酒精把， 我去看看这款
chunks.en: @8355 #5 Generally, wet wipes contain alcohol. I'll check this one out.

chunks.zh: @Daybyedream #3 老哥 洗面奶有推荐的吗，  晚上用完洗面奶会补水啥的吗
chunks.en: @Daybyedream #3 Bro, do you have any recommendations for facial cleansers? Will you replenish moisture after using a facial cleanser at night?

chunks.zh: @Shinu #2 好的， 之前挂过三甲同仁的， 开的药膏和小红书上差不多😂
chunks.en: @Shinu #2 Okay, I went to Tongren Hospital, a top-tier hospital, before; the ointment they prescribed is similar to what's on Xiaohongshu 😂

chunks.zh: @Daybyedream #3 注意要备孕的半年内别用，有副作用
chunks.en: @Daybyedream #3 Note that you shouldn't use them within six months of preparing for pregnancy, as they have side effects.

chunks.zh: 吃辣吗，熬夜吗。不吃辣不熬夜（十一点前睡觉）试试
chunks.en: Do you eat spicy food? Do you stay up late? Try not eating spicy food and not staying up late (sleeping before 11 pm)

chunks.zh: @pinkbook #11 有时候熬夜， 不怎么吃辣的
chunks.en: @pinkbook #11 I sometimes stay up late, and I don't eat much spicy food.

chunks.zh: 我是用了珂润，日本的那个洗面奶，然后油脸就没有了，再加上洗完用仁和的水保湿，但是我从来不涂乳液，感觉涂完反而油光满面
chunks.en: I used Curel, the Japanese facial cleanser, and then my oily face was gone. I also use Renhe water for moisturizing after washing, but I never apply lotion, because I feel like it makes my face even oilier.

chunks.zh: @aa514758835 #13 回头尝试下仁和的水
chunks.en: @aa514758835 #13 I will try Renhe water later.

chunks.zh: 推异维 A 酸的能不能当个人, 这个药服用期间和服用后一段时间怀孕高致畸的.
chunks.en: Can those who recommend isotretinoin be responsible people? This medicine has a high risk of causing birth defects during the period of use and for a period of time after use.

chunks.zh: 换一款洗面奶试试。
chunks.en: Try a different facial cleanser.
